name: Justin Hanney
body:
### Welcome
I'm Justin Hanney, a software developer in Seattle. I spent most of my life in North Carolina but plan to remain in Seattle because the beer and coffee are too good to leave.

### I Write Code
Most of my time is spent writing code for fun and to earn a living. Currently, I write code to make the global shipping trade more efficient at [Tideworks](http://www.tideworks.com).  In my past I've written code that powers the International Space Station as well as Amazon's Customer Reviews, internal analytics and Kindle.

### I Use Social Media
The NSA can track me on the following services.  Feel free to track me too.
* [Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/itshanney)
* [Instagram](http://www.twitter.com/jmhanney)
* [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/itshanney)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
